name: Name of your experiment
description: Explains the what and the why. What is the main idea? What is the purpose? Describes the coding process and implementation choices and gives a high level system overview.

name: A Square Divided Horizontally and Vertically into Four Equal Parts, Each with a Different Direction of Alternating Parallel Bands of Lines
description: Draws a large square with four inner squares filled with wiggly lines in different styles using p5.js and clipping.

name: A Square Divided Horizontally and Vertically into Four Equal Parts, Each with a Different Direction of Alternating Parallel Bands of Lines
description: Draws a large square with four inner squares filled with wiggly lines in different styles and colors using p5.js and clipping.

name: A Square Divided Horizontally and Vertically into Four Equal Parts, Each with a Different Direction of Alternating Parallel Bands of Lines
description: Draws a large square with four inner squares filled with wiggly lines in different styles, colors and loops using p5.js and clipping.

name: Simple Flow
description: initial experimenting with flow fields and perlin noise with mouse clicks.

name: Contrasted Merlin's Beard
description: initial experimenting with flow fields and perlin noise while introducing particle generators including mouse clicks.

name: Amalgamated Paint
description: initial experimenting with flow fields and perlin noise with particles to display a mixed paint-like strokes with mouse clicks.

name: Minor Flow Sound
description: initial experimenting with previous work and tone.js adding a kick drum loop with hihats and adding a minor chord progression with the particles.
